name: df-fwddif
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cfwddif, cmpt(s0, co(cc, cpm, cc), cmpt(s1, crab(s2, cdm(cv(s0)), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cdm(cv(s0)))), co(cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
comment: Define the forward difference operator. This is a discrete analogue of the derivative operator. Definition 2.42 of [GramKnuthPat], p. 47. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-May-2020.)
